suite2p.detection.sparsedetect¶

Module Contents¶

suite2p.detection.sparsedetect.get_sdmov(mov, ops)[source]¶
suite2p.detection.sparsedetect.get_overlaps(stat, ops)[source]¶

computes overlapping pixels from ROIs in stat inputs:

stat, Ly, Lx

outputs:

stat assigned to stat: overlap: (npix,1) boolean whether or not pixels also in another cell

suite2p.detection.sparsedetect.remove_overlaps(stat, ops, Ly, Lx)[source]¶

removes overlaps iteratively

suite2p.detection.sparsedetect.sparsery(ops)[source]¶
suite2p.detection.sparsedetect.circleMask(d0)[source]¶

creates array with indices which are the radius of that x,y point inputs:

d0 (patch of (-d0,d0+1) over which radius computed

outputs:

rs: array (2*d0+1,2*d0+1) of radii dx,dy: indices in rs where the radius is less than d0

suite2p.detection.sparsedetect.get_stat(ops, stat)[source]¶

computes statistics of cells found using sourcery inputs:

Ly, Lx, d0, mPix (pixels,ncells), mLam (weights,ncells), codes (ncells,nsvd), Ucell (nsvd,Ly,Lx)

outputs:

stat assigned to stat: ipix, ypix, xpix, med, npix, lam, footprint, compact, aspect_ratio, ellipse
